verbs.description: WASHINGTON D.C. -- Utahn Josh Holt [V: was] released after nearly two years in a Venezuelan prison and flew home to the United States Saturday , and the Holt family joined President Trump and others in the Oval Office to discuss his release .

WASHINGTON D.C. -- [ARG1: Utahn Josh Holt] was [V: released] [ARGM-TMP: after nearly two years in a Venezuelan prison] and flew home to the United States Saturday , and the Holt family joined President Trump and others in the Oval Office to discuss his release .
